entry.title: Scarcity Is Dead: Why Human Interaction Will Be the Next Great Asset Class
entry.summary: Knowledge is no longer scarce. AI collapsed it. The next scarce commodity? Human interaction.
entry.content:
Knowledge is no longer scarce. AI collapsed it. The next scarce commodity? Human interaction.

For centuries, knowledge drove value creation. Businesses competed on information asymmetry. But AI agents have erased that. Now, instant access to knowledge is free.

In this world, trust, permission, and authentic human interaction become the highest form of value.

The Human Channel is dedicated to building this permission-based interaction layer:
Smart Packets, PulseID, SPID Protocol, AI Agents with trusted rails.

This is not just the future of AI.
It's the future of human commerce.
